alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 4:55AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of eastern Schenectady, Albany, southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington, Rensselaer and southwestern Bennington Counties through 600 AM EST... At 454 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from near Rock City Falls to near Windham. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Bennington, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Scotia, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Arlington, Nassau, Delmar, Latham and Guilderland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 near exit 25. Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 7, and between exits 8A and 15. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
